creditline: Gift of Mrs. Eugene J. Carpenter and Olivia Carpenter Coan in memory of Eugene J. Carpenter
description: plate (one of a pair), blue on white porcelain; in the center is a pagoda with two women on the veranda and two children playing ball in the garden outside; in the rim are various trees and figures of people at different occupations sleeping, playing musical instruments, picking flowers, etc.
title: Plate, one of a pair
